main event: Two bright metallic objects were observed over Laguna, California by a group of witnesses on January 16, 1957.
interesting points: The objects were described as round, flat, and yellowish-orange,The objects shone brightly and would dim and disappear at regular intervals,The sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes,The observers reported the objects were low on the horizon and exhibited an unusual circling motion,The sighting was noted by several military personnel and a local gardener.
witness description: military personnel and a local gardener
